instructions.step: Brush the steak with a little of the oil, season and griddle for 2-3 minutes each side, according to taste. Remove from the pan and allow to rest. Fry the sliced pepper in the pan for 2 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the tagliatelle in boiling water for 4 minutes, then drain.
Place the parsley, including the stalks, chives, remaining oil and vinegar in a small food processor with 1 tbsp water and blitz to give a coarse paste. Stir into the tagliatelle with the peppers.
Slice the steak and place on top of the pasta.
